mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bu_member_info( id, code, type, login_code, login_pass, parent_id, email, mobile_phone, name, contact, status, sex_type, birthday, home_phone, cert_nbr, cert_pic1, cert_pic2, memcert_pic, card_nbr, card_pic1, card_pic2, addr, province, city, county, verify_flag, wx_route_id, zfb_route_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, `level`, draw_status, single_limit, day_limit, bus_pic, head_pic, desk_pic, inside_pic, staff_pic, ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{type}, #{loginCode}, #{loginPass}, #{parent.id}, #{email}, #{mobilePhone}, #{name}, #{contact}, #{status}, #{sexType}, #{birthday}, #{homePhone}, #{certNbr}, #{certPic1}, #{certPic2}, #{memcertPic}, #{cardNbr}, #{cardPic1}, #{cardPic2}, #{addr}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{verifyFlag}, #{wxRouteId}, #{zfbRouteId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{level}, #{drawStatus}, #{singleLimit}, #{dayLimit}, #{busPic}, #{headPic}, #{deskPic}, #{insidePic}, #{staffPic}, )

INSERT INTO bu_member_bank( id, member_id, bank_id, province, city, sub_id, bank_open, account_name, account_number, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{memberId}, #{bankId}, #{province}, #{city}, #{subId}, #{bankOpen}, #{accountName}, #{accountNumber}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
